The Royal Circle Membership

indulge, like never before

Become a member of the Royal Circle to enjoy unparalleled privileges at The Royal Retreat. Redeem your points to avail special benefits spread over a plethora of experiences. Explore the various Membership packages to best suit your travel requirement. Get in touch with us now to become a member.

Exclusive Benefits

Latest addition to Enigma is the live and very interactive Sushi Bar which seats 40 covers at a time

discounts with participating partners

and many more...

enroll yourself

To enroll yourself for the membership and avail benefits, fill the form and our dedicated executive will get back to you at the earliest 

    Interested? Call us at +91-9607-047-031

    Book your stay now
